post:
Last Thursday, the Central Bank reduced interest 0.5 % ↙️ So banks started implementing the decision and reducing interest on bank products 🏛 including certificates 📃

If you look for interest rates on changing certificates, you will find them in today's report in 21 banks, through which you will compare and reach the best choice 😎
📎https://bankygate.com/15099

post:
سوال.. اذا عندي كريديت ماستر ليمت 20 الف وجيت سددت فيه 10 الاف كمان
هل كدة اقدر استفيد من مزاياه لغاية 30 الف لو سافرت برة مصر

A question.. If I have a Credit Master Limit 20 thousand and I will pay 10 thousand too
Can I benefit from its benefits up to 30 thousand if I travel abroad?
